mapper.select: select*from bus_780_1_stops order by stop_no asc
select*from bus_routes where bus_route like CONCAT('%', #{routeNum}, '%') order by bus_route asc
mapper.insert: insert into reservations ( android_client_identifier, bus_identifier, reservation_to_stop ) values ( #{identifier}, #{busNumPlate}, #{stopToBook} )
mapper.delete: delete from reservations where android_client_identifier=#{identifier} and bus_identifier=#{busNumPlate}
delete from reservations where bus_identifier=#{busNumPlate} and reservation_to_stop=#{leftStop}
mapper.select: select stop_identifier, (6371*acos(cos(radians(#{lat}))*cos(radians(latitude))*cos(radians(longitude) -radians(#{lon}))+sin(radians(#{lat}))*sin(radians(latitude)))) AS distance FROM bus_780_1_stop_locations HAVING distance <= 0.05 ORDER BY distance LIMIT 0,1
